basis: User reports no snacking and adherence to the plan (water, reminder card, 3-minute reset, sensory grounding) with logs of urge and mood.
cognitive_dissonance: No explicit internal conflict or contradictory statements; user remains aligned with the plan.
negative_thought_patterns: No strong self-defeating beliefs evident in this turn; prior language hints at vigilance around urges but no persistent blaming or hopelessness observed.
emotional_triggers: Feeling on edge and stress-related urges; concern about bed-time eating (BED) noted in plan terms.
coaching_notes: Maintain a calm, nonjudgmental tone; reinforce ultra-simple actions and fresh micro-actions to sustain momentum.
